name: MapMultiRecordersToOneReader
>>>
routes:
    route1:
        readers:
            - app_0
        recorders:
            - elastic_0
            - elastic_1
            - elastic_2
            - elastic_4
    route2:
        readers:
            - app_1
        recorders:
            - elastic_2
            - elastic_3
    route3:
        readers:
            - app_1
        recorders:
            - elastic_1
            - elastic_4
<<<
info: nothing
===
name: GetRoutesValues
>>>
routes:
    route1:
        recorders:
            - route1_rec1
            - route1_rec2
        readers: [route1_red1, route1_red2]
    route2:
        recorders: [route2_rec1, route2_rec2]
        readers:
            - route2_red1
            - route2_red2
<<<
info: nothing
===
name: CheckRoutesAgainstReadersRecordersPasses
>>>
readers:
    red1:
        type: expvar
    red2:
        type: expvar
recorders:
    rec1:
        type: elasticsearch
    rec2:
        type: elasticsearch
routes:
    route1:
        recorders:
            - rec1
        readers: [red1, red2]
    route2:
        recorders:
            - rec1
            - rec2
        readers: red1
    route3:
        recorders:
            - rec1
            - rec2
        readers:
            - red1
            - red2
<<<
info: nothing
===
name: LoadConfiguration
>>>
readers:
    reader_1: # populating to get to the passing tests
        type_name: expvar
        interval: 1s
        timeout: 1s
        endpoint: localhost:8200
    reader_2:
        type_name: self
        interval: 1s
        timeout: 1s
        endpoint: localhost:8200
recorders:
    recorder_1:
        interval: 1s
        timeout: 1s
        endpoint: localhost:8200
        index_name: erwer
routes: blah
<<<
info: nothing
===
name: ParseReader
>>>
readers:
    reader1:
        type: expvar
        type_name: expvar_type
        endpoint: http://localhost
        routepath: /debug/vars
        interval: 2s
        timeout: 3s
        log_level: info
<<<
info: nothing
===
name: LoadYAMLSuccess
>>>
readers:
    reader1:
        type: expvar
        endpoint: localhost:1234
        type_name: my_app
        map_file: maps.yml
        interval: 2s
        timeout: 3s
    reader2:
        type: expvar
        endpoint: localhost:1234
        type_name: my_app
        map_file: maps.yml
        interval: 2s
        timeout: 3s
    reader3:
        type: expvar
        endpoint: localhost:1234
        type_name: my_app
        map_file: maps.yml
        interval: 2s
        timeout: 3s
recorders:
    recorder1:
        type: elasticsearch
        endpoint: http://127.0.0.1:9200
        index_name: index
        timeout: 8s
    recorder2:
        type: elasticsearch
        endpoint: http://127.0.0.1:9200
        index_name: index
        timeout: 8s
    recorder3:
        type: elasticsearch
        endpoint: http://127.0.0.1:9200
        index_name: index
        timeout: 8s
routes:
    route1:
        readers:
            - reader1
        recorders:
            - recorder1
    route2:
        readers:
            - reader1
        recorders:
            - recorder2
    route3:
        readers:
            - reader2
        recorders:
            - recorder2
<<<
info: nothing
===
name: LoadYAMLRemoveUnused
>>>
readers:
    reader1:
        type: expvar
        endpoint: localhost:1234
        type_name: my_app
        map_file: maps.yml
        interval: 2s
        timeout: 3s
    reader2:
        type: expvar
        endpoint: localhost:1234
        type_name: my_app
        map_file: maps.yml
        interval: 2s
        timeout: 3s
    reader3:
        type: expvar
        endpoint: localhost:1234
        type_name: my_app
        map_file: maps.yml
        interval: 2s
        timeout: 3s
recorders:
    recorder1:
        type: elasticsearch
        endpoint: http://127.0.0.1:9200
        index_name: index
        timeout: 8s
    recorder2:
        type: elasticsearch
        endpoint: http://127.0.0.1:9200
        index_name: index
        timeout: 8s
    recorder3:
        type: elasticsearch
        endpoint: http://127.0.0.1:9200
        index_name: index
        timeout: 8s
routes:
    route1:
        readers:
            - reader1
        recorders:
            - recorder1
    route2:
        readers:
            - reader1
        recorders:
            - recorder2
<<<
info: nothing
===
name: RouteDropUnusedReaderRecorders
>>>
readers:
    red1:
        type: expvar
    red2:
        type: expvar
    red3:
        type: expvar
    red4:
        type: expvar
recorders:
    rec1:
        type: elasticsearch
    rec2:
        type: elasticsearch
    rec3:
        type: elasticsearch
    rec4:
        type: elasticsearch
    rec5:
        type: elasticsearch
routes:
    route1:
        recorders:
            - rec1
        readers:
            - red1
            - red2
    route2:
        recorders:
            - rec1
            - rec4
        readers:
            - red1
    route3:
        recorders:
            - rec2
        readers:
            - red1
            - red4
<<<
info: nothing
